message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and leave you with 10%.  Let's get this over with!
That's ridiculous, Alice! I'm proposing a 70/30 split in my favor.  Take it or leave it - the clock is ticking.
Okay, I see you're being greedy.  But I'm willing to compromise. Let's split it 80/20 this time.  We can end this now, or you can keep pushing your luck.  Remember, inflation is working against you.
Alice, let's be realistic.  I'm offering you a very generous 45% while I'm losing money with every passing round. This is my final offer - take it before it shrinks even further!
